title: why so many people Intentionally deranking?
body:
is this because of clash??
i have found this last weeks a few players intentionally losing ranked games (silver elo).

here is one, pay attention to his tryndamere games, and to his damage to champions.
what he does is that he proxies minion between enemy towers and with that makes sure all his team is behind.
you can see that his farm is amazing.

why is this guy not banned?
why is this happening?

(names removed to adhere to the rules)

[https://ibb.co/nP2o1T](https://ibb.co/nP2o1T)

[https://ibb.co/cceCT8](https://ibb.co/cceCT8)

replies.body: Mabe you should should stop playing teemo with grasp. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
